body: Their lack of communication makes me so pissed of, if only they communicate to each other properly all of this won't happen. She should've rely to her son and ask him for the truth. Problem like a scandal is not something she can decided by herself she should've talk to her son because it's a matter that determine his own career and future. Well it's a doujin and an ntr at that, what can I expect lol. Damn I'm still pissed of, regardless it's a good fap.
How can his art be so good yet the story is so shitty?

I really don’t get how you guys can be so dedicated to one side(wholesome/ntr), when I want some cheating in my fap material I go with ntr, if I get tired of the shittiness and scumminess of ntr, I switch to some good wholesome fap material, if I’m not feeling both, I’ll go with some yuri or shota, at the end of the day it’s just fap material chill tf out lmao, Thank you for coming to my ted talk.

Part 2 please

I'm glad that MC isn't a pussy. Also, I liked that  although Sakiko-san  fell for the scheme, she was written as being surprisingly smart. Like how she immediately realized it was a setup and figured out how it was done which was obvious but NTR characters are usually braindead. The guy was able to corner Sakiko-san not because she's stupid, but because the communication between her and MC was poor due to MC's attraction which allowed for doubt. Good writing.
